EmailTemplate.description: Pricing discount being removed from account
EmailTemplate.name: 100+ pricing - Losing Discount
EmailTemplate.subject: Platinum Partners â€“ XXXX at Fire Mountain Gems and Bead
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
Our Platinum Partners annual review is complete. Due to limited activity, your account no longer qualifies for automatic 100+ discount pricing. You will still receive all assortable discount pricing on your individual orders.
If you have any questions, please call our friendly Customer Service representatives at 800-355-2137.
Wishing you the very best,
